headline: McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) to Close CosMc’s Locations, Bring Drink Flavors to Core Menu
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) announced on Friday that it will be closing its CosMc’s chain, a beverage-focused offshoot launched just two years ago. McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) stated that shutdowns of the standalone CosMc’s pilot locations will begin in June, along with the discontinuation of the CosMc’s mobile app. The company made the following statement: “The main […]

headline: McDonald's is closing its CosMc's restaurants but plans to test drinks the chain 'inspired'
summary: McDonald’s said Friday that it’s closing down CosMc’s, a new restaurant format it began piloting in the U.S. last year.  Among the drinks on CosMc’s current menu: a matcha iced latte, a turmeric spiced latte, a prickly pear-flavored slushy with popping candy on top and a frozen sour cherry energy drink.  McDonald’s announced in late 2023 that it wanted to test a small-format store with customizable drinks and treats that would appeal to afternoon snackers – and potentially grab sales from rivals like Starbucks and Dutch Bros. McDonald's sales often slump in the afternoon between mealtimes and the company wants to change that.

McDonald’s announced in late 2023 that it wanted to test a small-format store with customizable drinks and treats that would appeal to afternoon snackers – and potentially grab sales from rivals like Starbucks and Dutch Bros. headline: McDonald's to close standalone beverage concept
summary: (Reuters) -McDonald's Corp is shutting down the five beverage-centered CosMc's stores it opened in 2023, but said some drinks from the standalone concept would be tested in McDonald's restaurants.  The company said on Friday it had opened the stores as a  test to learn more about the “fast-growing beverage space,” which it said it had a “right to win.”  It said the standalone stores – in markets including San Antonio, Texas – allowed it to test new flavor and technologies without impacting existing McDonald’s restaurants.

headline: McDonald’s Bids Goodbye to CosMc’s, Its Space Alien-Themed Spinoff
summary: McDonald’s  has grounded its alien-themed CosMc’s offshoot before it ever fully took off.  The fast-food giant said Friday that it will pull the plug on its beverage-oriented offshoot, called CosMc’s after a McDonald’s alien mascot of old.  Next month, it plans to close its remaining stand-alone locations serving nonalcoholic drinks like Berry Hibiscus Sour-ade or Churro Cold Brew Frappé for around $5 a pop.

headline: McDonald’s Affirms Financial Strength with $1.77 Quarterly Dividend
summary: Despite facing a challenging macro environment characterized by reduced traffic in fast food chains, McDonald’s Corporation’s (NYSE:MCD) has reiterated its commitment to returning value to shareholders. On May 20, the company announced a $1.77 quarterly cash dividend, payable on June 16, to shareholders of record as of June 2, 2025. McDonald’s has always been a […]
